_source.title: Proportion of Alerts
_source.visState: {"title":"Proportion of Alerts","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".divide(.es(q=alert:1, metric=count),.es(*)).label('Proportion of Alerts')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Level 1: Alerts Weighted by Severities
_source.visState: {"title":"Level 1: Alerts Weighted by Severities","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".sum( .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:1, metric=count), 1 ), .multiply( .es(q=severity:2, metric=count),2 ) ), \n          .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:3, metric=count), 3), .multiply( .es(q=severity:4, metric=count),4 ) ) ).label('Metric 1: Weighted Severities')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Level 1: Derivative of Weighted Severity Metric
_source.visState: {"title":"Level 1: Derivative of Weighted Severity Metric","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".divide(.multiply(.divide(.sum( .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:1, metric=count), 1 ), .multiply( .es(q=severity:2, metric=count),2 ) ), \n          .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:3, metric=count), 3), .multiply( .es(q=severity:4, metric=count),4 ) ) ).label('Metric 1: Weighted Severities'), .sum(.sum(.es(q=severity:1, metric=count),.es(q=severity:2, metric=count)),.sum(.es(q=severity:3, metric=count),.es(q=severity:4, metric=count)))), .divide(.es(q=\"status.keyword:honeypot\", metric=count),.es(*))), .divide(.es(q=\"status.keyword:production\", metric=count),.es(*)))","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Level 2: Severities weighted by unique IP address count
_source.visState: {"title":"Level 2: Severities weighted by unique IP address count","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".sum( .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:1, metric=cardinality:geoip.ip, index=tst_breakup_02), 1 ), .multiply( .es(q=severity:2, metric=cardinality:geoip.ip, index=tst_breakup_02),2 ) ), \n          .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:3, metric=cardinality:geoip.ip, index=tst_breakup_02), 3), .multiply( .es(q=severity:4, metric=cardinality:geoip.ip, index=tst_breakup_02),4 ) ) ).label('Metric 3: Weighted Severities by Unique IP ')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Level 2: Severities weighted by Bytes
_source.visState: {"title":"Level 2: Severities weighted by Bytes","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".sum( .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:1, metric=sum:bytes_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02), 1 ), .multiply( .es(q=severity:2, metric=sum:bytes_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02),2 ) ), \n          .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:3, metric=sum:bytes_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02), 3), .multiply( .es(q=severity:4, metric=sum:bytes_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02),4 ) ) ).label('Metric 2: Weighted Severities by Bytes ')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}
